Notes: The French-derived term vitrina (in both Spa/Por) or vitrine (in Por) is also used.

Spanish: metedura de pata < Lat. + Ar. <ref>cite web=https://dle.rae.es/?id=P6ZDH5A</ref>

Notes: In Por. arando < Celt means cranberry
The term gare in Port. is also used for bus-station.
The term cais in Port. is also used for railway platforms.
